Description:
Qualifications/Skillset:Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field.
Proven experience in administering and supporting PowerSchool MIS is a must.
Strong technical skills and understanding of Oracle/SQL databases, data management, and reporting tools. Knowledge of PowerBi is a must.
Strong knowledge of Microsoft Excel
Proficiency in creating (.Net, ASP.Net, VB Net and C# Programming/coding applications) APIs, SQL, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. This is essential and required as majority of systems is custom built and requires timely integration and setup to ensure successful operations.
Maintain a commitment to and provide ongoing professional development.
Strong communication, public relation, and interpersonal skills.
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills with a keen attention to detail.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with various stakeholders.
Able to work in independently and to react well under pressure, handle and balance multiple demands at one time, work with frequent interruptions, and perform duties and tasks at expected levels of professionalism.
Experience in training end-users and developing training materials is preferred.
Knowledge of K-12 education systems and processes is a plus.Job Details
